Projects

Summer Intern

e-Yantra, Indian Institute of Technology - Bombay

Test Driven Development for creating applications and test scripts for the Texas Instrument's TIVA Launchpad, MSP430 microcontroller.
Developed a cross-platform CLI app for evaluating and grading assignments of users of the e-Yantra MOOC portal, thus freeing up considerable resources from the server.

Overview of the project
May, 2020 - June, 2020

SPArK-BOT Platform

Final Year Project and e-YANTRA IDEAS COMPETITION 19-20

Created a robotic platform which all students, hobbyists and developers alike, can use to build their applications. No programming experience is required to build applications on this platform. At the same time, it is also scalable and experienced programmers can use this platform along with their programming language of choice to build advanced robotic solutions.

Demonstration video Elevator Pitch
August 2019 - March 2020

Computer Graphics Virtual Lab

Virtual Labs, Indian Institute of Technology - Bombay

Developed a virtual lab for the Computer Graphics subject. The virtual lab is approved and hosted by the Indian Institute of Technology - Bombay and the Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD), Government of India, under the National Mission on Education through Information and Communication Technology (NMEICT).

Virtual lab hosted by IIT-Bombay
January 2019 - April 2019

Android App Developer

Developed a social messaging android app called SPArK Messenger. Did a survey of all the existing messaging platforms and then identified missing features in all of them. Studied the findings of the survey and developed six features which were not present in any of the existing apps.
Also developed an app to manage Firebase database easily from any phone without using Google‚Äôs online portal. This app is still under development.

Apps hosted on the Google Play Store

Interests

Apart from being a budding engineer, I enjoy my time working on my projects and self-development. I love to learn new things and am constantly in search for the next new-technology to try. I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technological advancements in research as well as new tech-products coming out into the market.

When I need a break from tech, I love to travel and wander outdoors. Tennis is the sport which is most dear to my heart and I follow the sport with the utmost passion.
